Uses of Package
org.opengrok.indexer.authorization

  • Packages that use org.opengrok.indexer.authorization 
    Package Description
    opengrok.auth.plugin  
    org.opengrok.indexer.authorization  
    org.opengrok.indexer.configuration  
    org.opengrok.indexer.framework  
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization used by opengrok.auth.plugin 
    Class Description
    IAuthorizationPlugin
    Interface for authorization plug-ins.
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization used by org.opengrok.indexer.authorization 
    Class Description
    AuthControlFlag
    Enum for available authorization roles.
    AuthorizationEntity
    This class covers authorization entities used in opengrok.
    AuthorizationEntity.PluginDecisionPredicate
    Predicate specialized for the the plugin decisions.
    AuthorizationEntity.PluginSkippingPredicate
    Predicate specialized for the the entity skipping decisions.
    AuthorizationPlugin
    This is a subclass of AuthorizationEntity and is a wrapper to a IAuthorizationPlugin delegating the decision methods to the contained plugin.
    AuthorizationStack
    Subclass of AuthorizationEntity.
    IAuthorizationPlugin
    Interface for authorization plug-ins.
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization used by org.opengrok.indexer.configuration 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationFramework
    Placeholder for performing authorization checks.
    AuthorizationStack
    Subclass of AuthorizationEntity.
  • Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization used by org.opengrok.indexer.framework 
    Class Description
    IAuthorizationPlugin
    Interface for authorization plug-ins.
